entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
